knimeNode.name: String To SVG
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts a String or XML column to SVG images.

fullDescription.intro: Converts a String or XML column to SVG images. If you want to read multiple SVG files, e.g. from a directory, you probably want to use the "List Files" node in combination with the "Read Images" node.
fullDescription.option: The String or XML column contain valid SVG text (or xml).
Choose whether you want to replace the selected input or append a new column containing the SVG objects.

If selected, the node will fail during execution if any cell contains invalid SVG image data. If unselected, the node will skip these invalid entries and insert a missing value instead. Note that if the parsing fails for all cells, the node will fail in either case.

ports.outPort: Input data with the new image data.
